casebody.data:
ATLANTIC LIGHTERAGE CORPORATION, Libelant-Appellant, v. THE Ferryboat JAMESTOWN, Her Engines, etc., Erie Railroad Company, Claimant-Appellee. No. 412. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 4, 1934. Burlingham, Veeder, Pearey, Clark & Hupper, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and Stanley R. Wright, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Lynch & Hagen, of New York City (Anthony V. Lynch, Jr., and Henry C. Eidenbach, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
